name: One Small Step (ABird)
description:
What is left in the aftermath of progress? One Small Step, a space walking simulator, uses procedural generation to discover just that by immersing players in the wake of space colonization.The visual and audio elements of this game encourage players to remember that one small step can leave one giant footprint.

One Small Step Directions:

Put on your headphones!

Use your mouse to look around levels, use space to jump, and use the WASD keys to move forward, left, back, and right, respectively. Certain objects will trigger an occurrence when you collide with them. If you fall off an edge, don’t worry, the game will reset you. Press Escape or Q to quit the game, and R to restart from the main menu. Look, listen, and explore!
